content: APP Marketing has a diverse team of International and Chinese business marketers. If you are XXXXXXXXX </br>Managing Director Cyrus Janssen has been consulting and advising businesses in North America in China since 2007. He is an expert in Chinese marketing in Canada and is passionately driven to help build the “cultural bridge” between North America and China.

questions.item: Do you have an business idea that you would like to bring to the Chinese market?
Would you like to connect with Chinese factories and suppliers to produce your product?
Would you like to attract more overseas Chinese tourists and visitors to your business?

followup: Schedule a one on one phone call with our team.
